Dialogues.Name: Cheveyo
Texts: It's bleeding. You shot well, Shilah. But it is in pain, you have to put an end to it's suffer.

Dialogues.Name: Cheveyo
Texts: It gave it's life for us. For the tribe. There's no shame or guilt in taking it's life.

Dialogues.Name: Shila
Texts: I Don't want it's blood in my hands. It's so cruel.

Dialogues.Name: Cheveyo
Texts: It's already in your hands. Go on, one strike straight through it's neck, it won't even feel, Shilah, keeping it alive is torture.

Dialogues.Name: Cheveyo
Texts: Alright, i'll show you this time how you should do, then you'll do it yourself. I promissed to your father that I would teach you.
Right here, in the vein. Straight downwards, no twisting. You just need to Press [action].

Dialogues.Name: Cheveyo
Texts: Now you just need to make a vertical cut through it's skin, from the head to it's tail, through the belly. Press [action] and the skin will come off easily. Or press [cancel] to get it's meat.

Dialogues.Name: Cheveyo
Texts: Good, you'll go north, i'll go south. We meet here at high noon. Bring me 5 skins and 10 chunks of meat well cut.
The ancient's festival is near. Go.
